title: Ornaments
content:
Hi All,

I’m looking for some new ornaments. I like Bodoni Classic Ornaments (see attached sample). Does anyone know of other sources for ornaments in this style?

Thanks!

 [‹ Pairing: Avantgarde Gothic (Book and Light) with ...](http://web.archive.org/web/20071121165443/http:/typophile.com/node/37950 "Go to previous forum topic") [Typeface for personal letters and correspondence ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071121165443/http:/typophile.com/node/37720 "Go to next forum topic")
author: talgoretsky

comments.content:
Can’t seem to be able to post an image. Here’s a link:

[http://www.fonthaus.com/products/fonts/view.cfm/sku/MI204178/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071121165443/http:/www.fonthaus.com/products/fonts/view.cfm/sku/MI204178/ "http://www.fonthaus.com/products/fonts/view.cfm/sku/MI204178/")

I’m looking specifically for line ornaments that can be placed on either side of text (like the two on the lower left, last line).

Thanks.

IIRC mention here, H&FJ may have a font with such “Bulging Rules”.  
They’re not that hard to make in Illustrator.
